objects.name: Identify web defensive services
objects.description: An adversary can attempt to identify web defensive services as [https://www.cloudflare.com/ CloudFlare], [https://github.com/jjxtra/Windows-IP-Ban-Service IPBan], and [https://www.snort.org/ Snort]. This may be done by passively detecting services, like [https://www.cloudflare.com/ CloudFlare] routing, or actively, such as by purposefully tripping security defenses. (Citation: NMAP WAF NSE)
objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Active service detection may trigger an alert.  Passive service enumeration is not detected.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Adversary can passively detect services (e.g., [https://www.cloudflare.com/ CloudFlare] routing) or actively detect services (e.g., by purposefully tripping security defenses)
